column1: '''Fangorn Comes to Helm's Deep''' is the sixty-first scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was not featured in the theatrical release of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''.
